summary: A high‑level pipeline that combines a variational auto‑encoder, CLIP text encoder, tokenizer, conditional UNet, scheduler, and safety checker to transform textual prompts into images. It manages latent space preparation, denoising, decoding, and optional semantic editing while ensuring generated content complies with safety standards.
business_intent: Enable developers and content creators to integrate advanced text‑to‑image generation with controllable latent editing into applications such as advertising, design, entertainment, and rapid prototyping, while providing built‑in safety filtering.
